title: Create VS Code Extension for Horizon Tools
description: Create a new VS Code extension package in the Horizon monorepo that registers language model tools for Copilot, directly integrating Horizon's core library to manage tasks without CLI or MCP. This enables seamless task management in VS Code chats, using InversifyJS for DI and storing data in .horizon/issues.jsonl.

title: Set up VS Code extension package structure
description: Create packages/vscode-extension directory with package.json and tsconfig.json, and update root package.json workspaces.

title: Define language model tools in extension package.json
description: Add contributes.languageModelTools to package.json for Horizon commands like create, list, update.

title: Implement extension.ts for tool registration
description: Write extension.ts to register tools, initialize Horizon container, and invoke core services.
